project_descr: This project seeks to strengthen the internal democratic structures of political parties as well as build trust public trust in the electoral processes

outputs.output_descr: Joint Party Support and Strengthening Project of political parties, the Electoral Commission and electoral processes in Ghana towards the 2016 general elections

document_name: Joint Party Support and Strengthening Project
MOU JPASS Memorandum final signed Dec 2014
Consultancy for Comparative Study on International Best Practices on Gender Policies in Political Parties
Individual Consultancy for Comparative Study on Internal Party Communication Policies
Individual Consultancy for Technical Review of Internal Party Membership Database and Establishment of Minimum Standards
Individual Consultancy for the Development of Internal Gender and Inclusive Policy for Political Parties in Ghana (Lot 1-Lot 5)
Individual Consultancy for the Development of Internal Party Communication Policies and Implementation Strategies (Lot 1-Lot 5)
Individual Consultancy for the Development of Tools for Monitoring and Reporting on Political Parties Compliance to the Political Party Act 574 (2000
Individual Consultancy for the Political Party Membership Database Design and Deployment
Individual Consultancy for the Production of high-quality short videos on Gender and Women Political Participation in Ghana
https://info.undp.org/docs/pdc/Documents/GHA/J-PASS Gender Training for Political Party Executives Final Report.pdf
project_title: joint party support and strengthening project
